title: Lvds cables for macbook pro 13"  non-retina (2009-2011)
message:
Hello year & Happy New Year

i am doing about 5 screen repairs, some have broken lvds cable. are these cable interchangeable thru-out between year 2009-2011? 

also the aftermarket lvds cables found on ebay, the cable sleeves seems a little shorter and rounder than the genuine flat cable?

i already know the cable on 2012 has a silver tip.


Thanks

title: Lvds cables for macbook pro 13"  non-retina (2009-2011)
message: 2008-2010 are all the same. 2011 is unique to 2011 year. 2012+ has different connector again.

title: Lvds cables for macbook pro 13"  non-retina (2009-2011)
